translations: n．主席（复数）：一个组织、委员会或会议的主持人。
· The chairpersons of the two committees will meet to discuss the issue.
两个委员会的主席将会面讨论这个问题。

sentences.sentence: They were both chairpersons of the students' union.
He was one of the chairpersons of our students' union.
sentences.translation: 他是我们学生会的主席之一。

sentences.sentence: What are some qualities to consider when appointing committee chairpersons?
sentences.translation: 当指派委员会主委需考虑些什么特质？
